parameters.name: TT_DATA_A
parameters.description: describes the type of individual data samples input of Matrix A to the gemv function. This is a typename and must be one of the following:

parameters.name: TT_DATA_B
parameters.description: describes the type of individual data samples input vector B to the gemv function. This is a typename and must be one of the following:

parameters.name: TP_DIM_A
parameters.description: is an unsigned integer which describes the number of elements along the unique dimension (rows) of Matrix A.

parameters.name: TP_DIM_B
parameters.description: is an unsigned integer which describes the number of elements along vector B, this is a shared dimension with Matrix A

parameters.name: TP_SHIFT
parameters.description: describes power of 2 shift down applied to the accumulation of product terms before each output. TP_SHIFT must be in the range 0 to 61.

parameters.name: TP_RND
parameters.description: describes the selection of rounding to be applied during the shift down stage of processing. TP_RND must be in the range 0 to 7 where

parameters.name: TP_NUM_FRAMES
parameters.description: describes the number matrix-vector multiplications occuring per window of matrix/vector input data

parameters.name: TP_CASC_LEN
parameters.description: describes the number of AIE Tiles to split the GEMV operation into.
